titleStmt.title: The Statute-laws perused and revived, or, A Remedy against pedlers, hawkers, and petty chapmen &c. fit to be known by all constables and other parish-officers, also by the ministers in the countrey, and all other persons whatsoever.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Brab. Aylmer ... William Miller ... Daniel Browne ... and by several other booksellers,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard Law School Library.
